docTitle.titlePart:
Reactions induced by real photons
for nuclear structure and nuclear astrophysics
$

byline.affiliation: Institut für Kernphysik, Technische Universität Darmstadt,

front.div:
Abstract
This contribution presents examples for recent experimental studies with real photons. Topics include the electric
dipole response below the particle separation energy (pygmy resonance), the magnetic scissors mode in deformed nu-
clei, an analysis of low-lying electric quadrupole strength and astrophysical applications. Results of reactions induced
by real photons are compared to those obtained from virtual photons (electron scattering, Coulomb excitation).
front.keyword:
Keywords: Nuclear reactions, Photon scattering, Photo-disintegration, E1 pygmy resonance, M1 scissors mode,
Big-bang nucleosynthesis, E1 giant quadrupole resonance, Mixed-symmetry states
